definition: to look after/to take care of/to watch/to guard
to see/to look at/to read/to watch/to visit/to call on/to consider/to regard as/to look after/to treat (an illness)/to depend on/to feel (that)/(after verb) to give it a try/Watch out! (for a danger)

sentences.english: We'd better arrange a try-on with a small order before we place a big order .
sentences.chinese: 我們在下大定單之前，最好安排個小定單試試看。

sentences.english: Try disabling the audio in CCE.
Maybe  you  don't  believe  me, but  try  to go without a water heater for just one day.
sentences.chinese: 也許你不相信我，但試試看沒有熱水器過一天。

sentences.english: You can try it right now.
Liz suggested (that) I try the shop on Mill Road.
sentences.chinese: 莉斯建議我到米爾路的商店試試看。

sentences.english: Let me try it. we will see .
sentences.chinese: 我來試試看看，成敗在此一舉。

sentences.english: MeiLin: You should try out for the school.
I can't help but agree with you there.
sentences.chinese: 他留下個活話，說能不能幫上忙試試看。

sentences.english: Try a graham cracker or bowl of cereal.
sentences.chinese: 試試看全麥餅乾或者一碗麥片。

sentences.english: Transfer the game to internal HDD and try again.
sentences.chinese: 把遊戲灌到內置硬碟再重新運行試試看。

sentences.english: Try it—there are so many cases when both words will get past Spellchecker.
sentences.chinese: 試試看，還有很多這樣迷惑校對者的例子。

sentences.english: I'll have a try, it's neck or nothing.
sentences.chinese: 我來試試看，成敗在此一舉。

sentences.english: Try and see whether you can get their support.
sentences.chinese: 你試試看，能否得到他們的支持。

sentences.english: CASEY : Without your little exorcism book? Hey, go ahead.
sentences.chinese: 不用你的小趨魔書？呵，你儘管試試看。

definition: It is said that ... (at the start of a narrative)/to discuss/to recount
only/merely/no more than/but/however/anyway (to get back to a previous topic)/cannot be more (after adjectival)
Correct!/Oh, that's right, ... (when one suddenly remembers sth one wanted to mention)/Oh, by the way, ...
to say again/to put off a discussion until later/moreover/what's more/besides
how?/how about?/how was it?/how are things?
